commits.message: ci(workflows): add ml and ingest to CI matrix

verification: Ran: git commit -m 'ci(workflows): add ml and ingest to CI matrix'
Would run: GitHub Actions will verify ml and ingest jobs run ruff check and pytest on next push
notes: Fixed CRLF line endings to pass git diff --check
Job renamed from 'api-and-ui' to 'lint-and-test' for consistency
Added ml and ingest to CI matrix alongside existing api and ui projects
